summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit numbered requirements (and states “Requirements: none”), so no missing REQ-* items can be asserted from the diff. The only modified file is project_state.json, whose summary text mentions additional app features (install prompt, monetization UI) that are not requested in the BuildRequest.
